title: Takumar club - Page 984
author: GUB
text: Originally posted by Andrew_Oid The Pentax Forums lens reviews says there are four versions of the 135mm f3.5 with five elements and two later versions with four elements. Either the person who put the page together erred or I have a transitional copy that I can't find information about. My copy is an all black preset with a 49mm filter size (ser # 799372). Anyone else have the black preset (not the auto-Tak) and can verify a 46mm filter thread? I, too, like the 46mm lenses and have three, the 35mm auto-Tak, the 55mm f2, and the 55mm f2.2. I do check eBay from time to time to see if the chrome and black 135 is being offered. I haven't succumbed to the temptation to buy one yet. I have 2 all black Takumars preset 49mm serial number 725714 and 798388. My 46mm is silver / black serial 227358
